title: Apple Needs to Do an AI Acquisition, Says Dan Ives
description: Wedbush Head of Tech Research Dan Ives says Apple is so far behind in artificial intelligence development that it needs to make an acquisition to catch up. Ives joins Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on “Bloomberg Tech.” (Source: Bloomberg)

title: Apple Looks to Regain Mojo With AI Robots, Lifelike Siri
description: Apple is plotting an artificial intelligence comeback with new devices, including robots and a lifelike version of Siri. Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman discusses the iPhone maker’s plans with Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on "Bloomberg Tech." (Source: Bloomberg)
content:
00:00

title: Algorithmic truth: How artificial intelligence is redefining verification and credibility
description: The paper argues that AI systems do not simply discover truth; they compute it. In this new epistemic framework, truth is no longer the result of human debate, evidence weighing, and institutional vetting. Instead, it emerges from the inner workings of probabilistic models, pattern recognition systems, and data pipelines. These systems rely on vast training datasets, algorithmic proxies, and optimization objectives to determine credibility and accuracy.
content: Artificial intelligence is no longer just a technological tool, it is increasingly becoming the arbiter of what counts as truth. A new review warns that the rise of algorithmically mediated knowledge is reshaping the foundations of public discourse a... [4248 chars]

title: AI company optimizes buildings with green energy

title: Man who asked ChatGPT about cutting out salt from his diet was hospitalized with hallucinations
description: A 60-year-old man spent three weeks being treated at a hospital after replacing table salt with sodium bromide following consultation with a popular artificial intelligence chatbot.
content:

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - AI Revolution: SabhaSaar Transforms Panchayat Meeting Minutes
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Eightfold AI Achieves All Three Levels of ISO/IEC 42001:2023 Certification
description: SANTA CLARA, Calif., Aug. 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Eightfold AI, the leader in AI-powered talent intelligence, today announced that it has been certified to ISO/IEC 42001:2023, the international management system standard for artificial intelligence. Eightfold is the first HR technology vendor to be certified for controls as a developer of AI systems, a provider of AI-enabled services, and a consumer of third‑party AI.
